gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem.AbstractRelation
      • gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasPredicate, Relation, SemanticItem, java.lang.Comparable<SemanticItem>

    public class Event
extends AbstractRelation
implements HasPredicate
    Implementation of an event, essentially a predicate-argument structure where arguments (participants) have semantic roles. An event is indicated by a Predicate object.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      • toStandoffAnnotation

        public java.lang.String toStandoffAnnotation()
        Gets the standoff annotation format text for the event.

        The format for an event is the following (tab after [ID]) [ID] [TYPE]:[PREDICATE_ID] [ARG1_ROLE]:[ARG1_ID] [ARG2_ROLE]:[ARG2:ID] ...

        Specified by:
        toStandoffAnnotation in interface SemanticItem
        Returns:
        the string representation in standoff annotation format
